name: Go Trexx
tag_list: travel-apps, childrens-apps, kids-apps, childrens-travel-guides, travel-guides, app-developer
overview: Founded in 2011, Go Trexx is a developer of entertaining travel applications designed for children ages 7 – 12 to maximize their understanding and enjoyment of popular historical sites and points of interest at global travel destinations. Each destination-specific app features curious travel facts, educational trivia, customizable postcards and family conversation starters that give users a deeper understanding of the sites they are visiting. Go Trexx applications are available for both Apple and Android platforms. Headquartered in Newport Beach, CA, Go Trexx is committed to turning up the dial on fun during family vacations. The company is committed to creating robust mobile applications that employ cutting edge technology and deliver interesting and inspiring content to children through a set of entertaining and relevant features.
